query: query($zone:String!,$ray1:String,$ray2:String){ viewer { zones(filter:{zoneTag:$zone}) { ray1: firewallEventsAdaptive(filter:{rayName:$ray1},limit:5,orderBy:[datetime_DESC]) { action source ruleId rayName clientRequestMethod clientRequestURI clientRequestHTTPHost edgeResponseStatus datetime } ray2: firewallEventsAdaptive(filter:{rayName:$ray2},limit:5,orderBy:[datetime_DESC]) { action source ruleId rayName clientRequestMethod clientRequestURI clientRequestHTTPHost edgeResponseStatus datetime } } } }
